thread.section_title: StockWiseAuto.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of StockWiseAuto.com | stockwiseauto.com | 7 of 272
thread.title: Glenn

author: Glenn
title: Glenn
text: At first I was upset with my first order because it got cancelled without notice, or though I thought. I made a mistake on my email address so I did not get the notice to validate my order. Stock wise auto takes extra steps to protect the consumer. Once I corrected my mistake all three of my orders arrived in a timely manner and the shipping notice that goes out is great, I was able to track my shipments with ease. Superior service! Thanks for protecting your customers from fraud. Two thumbs up!
